response.name: getAllRecipes
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": 1,
        "title": "Spaghetti Carbonara",
        "description": "Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.",
        "ingredients": "Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan cheese, Pancetta, Black pepper, Salt",
        "steps": "1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Cook pancetta. 3. Mix eggs with cheese. 4. Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture. 5. Season with pepper and salt.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 2,
        "title": "Chicken Alfredo",
        "description": "Creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken over fettuccine pasta.",
        "ingredients": "Fettuccine, Chicken breast, Heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, Garlic, Butter, Salt, Black pepper",
        "steps": "1. Cook fettuccine. 2. Grill chicken. 3. Make Alfredo sauce with cream, cheese, butter, and garlic. 4. Combine with pasta and chicken. 5. Season to taste.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 3,
        "title": "Caesar Salad",
        "description": "Fresh romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.",
        "ingredients": "Romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, Croutons, Parmesan cheese, Lemon juice, Garlic, Olive oil",
        "steps": "1. Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing. 2. Add croutons and Parmesan cheese. 3. Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 4,
        "title": "Beef Tacos",
        "description": "Ground beef tacos with seasoned meat and your favorite toppings.",
        "ingredients": "Ground beef, Taco seasoning, Taco shells, Lettuce, Tomato, Cheddar cheese, Sour cream",
        "steps": "1. Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. 2. Fill taco shells with beef. 3. Top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 5,
        "title": "Vegetable Stir Fry",
        "description": "Stir-fried vegetables in a savory sauce served over rice.",
        "ingredients": "Bell peppers, Broccoli, Carrots, Soy sauce, Garlic, Ginger, Rice",
        "steps": "1. Cook rice. 2. Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger. 3. Add soy sauce and cook until vegetables are tender. 4. Serve over rice.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 6,
        "title": "Pancakes",
        "description": "Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh fruit.",
        "ingredients": "Flour, Eggs, Milk, Baking powder, Sugar, Butter, Maple syrup, Fresh fruit",
        "steps": "1. Mix dry ingredients. 2. Add eggs, milk, and melted butter. 3. Cook on a griddle. 4. Serve with syrup and fruit.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 7,
        "title": "Greek Salad",
        "description": "A fresh salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.",
        "ingredients": "Cucumbers, Tomatoes, Kalamata olives, Feta cheese, Red onion, Olive oil, Oregano, Lemon juice",
        "steps": "1. Chop vegetables. 2. Combine with olives and feta. 3. Dress with olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 8,
        "title": "Chicken Soup",
        "description": "Comforting chicken soup with vegetables and noodles.",
        "ingredients": "Chicken breast, Carrots, Celery, Onion, Chicken broth, Egg noodles, Salt, Black pepper",
        "steps": "1. Cook chicken and vegetables in broth. 2. Add egg noodles and cook until tender. 3. Season with salt and pepper.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 9,
        "title": "Lasagna",
        "description": "Layers of pasta, meat sauce, and cheese baked to perfection.",
        "ingredients": "Lasagna noodles, Ground beef, Marinara sauce, Ricotta cheese, Mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, Onion, Garlic",
        "steps": "1. Cook meat with onion and garlic. 2. Layer noodles with meat sauce and cheeses. 3. Bake until bubbly and golden.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 10,
        "title": "BBQ Ribs",
        "description": "Tender ribs coated in BBQ sauce and slow-cooked to perfection.",
        "ingredients": "Pork ribs, BBQ sauce, Brown sugar, Garlic powder, Onion powder, Paprika, Salt, Black pepper",
        "steps": "1. Rub ribs with spices. 2. Bake or grill with BBQ sauce. 3. Cook until tender and caramelized.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 11,

        "description": "Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.",
        "ingredients": "Pizza dough, Tomato sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Fresh basil, Olive oil, Salt",
        "steps": "1. Spread tomato sauce on dough. 2. Add cheese and basil. 3. Bake until crust is crispy and cheese is melted.",
        "image": null
    },
    {
        "id": 12,

        "ingredients": "Chicken breast, Cream cheese, Buffalo sauce, Cheddar cheese, Ranch dressing, Celery",
        "steps": "1. Mix shredded chicken with cream cheese, buffalo sauce, and ranch dressing. 2. Top with cheddar cheese and bake until bubbly.",
        "image": null
    },
    {

        "ingredients": "Corn tortillas, Chicken, Cheese, Enchilada sauce, Onion, Garlic, Cumin",

    },

        "steps": "1. Brown the beef with onions and garlic. 2. Add beans, tomatoes, and spices. 3. Simmer until flavors meld.",
        "image": null
    },

        "ingredients": "Chickpeas, Garlic, Onion, Parsley, Cumin, Coriander, Baking powder, Salt, Black pepper, Oil",

        "ingredients": "Flour, Butter, Sugar, Eggs, Lemon juice, Lemon zest, Baking powder",

response.name: getOneRecipe
response.body:
{
    "id": 1,
    "title": "Spaghetti Carbonara",
    "description": "Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.",
    "ingredients": "Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan cheese, Pancetta, Black pepper, Salt",
    "steps": "1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Cook pancetta. 3. Mix eggs with cheese. 4. Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture. 5. Season with pepper and salt.",
    "image": null
}

body.raw:
{
  "id": 47,
  "title": "Mushroom Risotto",
  "description": "Creamy risotto with sautéed mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.",
  "ingredients": "Arborio rice, Mushrooms, Onion, Garlic, Vegetable broth, White wine, Parmesan cheese, Butter, Olive oil, Salt, Black pepper",
  "steps": "1. Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil. 2. Add mushrooms and cook until tender. 3. Stir in Arborio rice and cook for a few minutes. 4. Deglaze with white wine. 5. Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring constantly, until rice is creamy and cooked through. 6. Stir in Parmesan cheese and butter. Season with salt and pepper.",
  "image": null
}
